column1: MIDAS src_id 10704 CHEPSTOW: MOOR ST W WKS Start 1950 end 1991

NGR is from the 1950s record and is near a reservoir but not on Moor Street. Stated altitudes for most of the record is 176 ft and too low but last year has an altitude that matches. The record has Bethdour crossed out for the name and this is near the reservoir. NGR might be 100m S to be closer to reservoir
